title: The Wheat and the Chaff feat. Christopher Rivas
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this tale with Finnish roots, Christopher Rivas (Call Me Kat, Brown Enough) plays a sly fox who tricks a pair of bullies into reaping what they sow.
itunes:author: WBUR
